SEARCH
Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
public interface IGameBoard
A game board of ConnectX A cpsc.extendedConnectX.models.GameBoard is a (3-100)X(3-100) that places tokens verifies position, displays board statuses, and verifies a winner or tie. Initialization: cpsc.extendedConnectX.models.GameBoard contains up to 100 rows and 100 columns and no less than 3 rows and 3 columns of blank characters Separated by "|" <> Defines: number_of_rows: 3-100 number_of_columns: 3-100 number_to_win: 3-25 Constraints: 0 <= number_of_rows < MAX_SIZE 0 <= number_of_columns < MAX_SIZE MIN_TO_WIN <= number_to_win <= MAX_TO_WIN

  • Method Details

    • checkIfFree

      default boolean checkIfFree(int c)
      Returns True if column can fit another token; otherwise, returns False if full
      Returns:
      True if chosen column can fit another token; otherwise, returns false
      Pre:
      c>= 0 AND c< MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      checkIfFree iff [column fits tokens] AND c = #c
      Parameters:
      c - the column the token is placed

    • placeToken

      void placeToken(char p, int c)
      places the character p token in chosen column c. The token is placed in the lowest available row in column.
      Pre:
      p == char c >= 0 AND c < MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      p = #p AND c = #c
      Parameters:
      p - The character of the last player who placed a token
      c - the column the token is placed

    • checkForWin

      default boolean checkForWin(int c)
      checks to see if the last token placed has resulted in the player winning the game. If so, returns True; otherwise, returns False
      Returns:
      True if last token placed results in win; otherwise returns False
      Pre:
      c >= 0 AND c< MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      checkForWin iff checkDiagWin(pos,p) OR checkVertWin(pos,p) OR checkHorizWin(pos,p)
      Parameters:
      c - the column the token is placed

    • checkTie

      default boolean checkTie()
      checks to see if the last token placed has left no free board positions remaining, resulting in a tie. If conditions for a tie is met, Returns true; otherwise, return false
      Returns:
      True if there are no free board positions remaining; otherwise, returns false
      Pre:
      NONE
      Post:
      checkTie iff [no free board positions remaining]

    • checkHorizWin

      default boolean checkHorizWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checks to see if the last token placed has resulted in a number_to_win in a row win horizontally. returns true if conditions are met; otherwise, return false
      Returns:
      True if latest placed token results in number_to_win in a row horizontally; otherwise, returns false
      Pre:
      p == char pos.getRow() >= 0 AND pos.getRow()<= MAX_SIZE AND pos.getColumn() >= 0 AND pos.getColumn()<= MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      checkHorizWin iff [latest player token placed number_to_win in a row horizontally] AND p = #p
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the game board
      p - The character of the last player who placed a token

    • checkVertWin

      default boolean checkVertWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checks to see if the last token placed has resulted in a number_to_win in a row win vertically. returns true if conditions are met; otherwise, return false
      Returns:
      True if latest placed token results in number_to_win in a row vertically; otherwise, returns false
      Pre:
      p== char AND pos.getRow()>= 0 AND pos.getRow()<= MAX_SIZE AND pos.getColumn()>= 0 AND pos.getColumn()<= MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      checkVertWin iff [latest player token placed number_to_win in a row vertically] AND p = #p
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the game board
      p - The character of the last player who placed a token

    • checkDiagWin

      default boolean checkDiagWin(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      checks to see if the last token placed has resulted in a number_to_win in a row win diagonally. returns true if conditions are met; otherwise, return false
      Returns:
      True if latest player token results in number_to_win in a row diagonally; otherwise, returns false
      Pre:
      p == char AND pos.getRow()>= 0 AND pos.getRow()< MAX_SIZE AND pos.getColumn()>= 0 AND pos.getColumn()< MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      checkDiagWin iff [latest player token placed number_to_win in a row diagonally] AND p = #p
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the game board
      p - The character of the last player who placed a token

    • whatsAtPos

      char whatsAtPos(BoardPosition pos)
      return Checks what is in pos and returns the character. If no character is found, returns a blank space char
      Returns:
      char in position; otherwise, return blank space char
      Pre:
      pos.getRow() >= 0 AND pos.getRow()< MAX_SIZE AND pos.getColumn()>= 0 AND pos.getColumn()< MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      whatsAtPos = ' ' OR char
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the game board

    • isPlayerAtPos

      default boolean isPlayerAtPos(BoardPosition pos, char p)
      return true if player is at parameter position; otherwise, return false
      Returns:
      True if player is at position; returns false if not
      Pre:
      p== char AND pos.getRow()>= 0 AND pos.getRow()< MAX_SIZE AND pos.getColumn()>= 0 AND pos.getColumn()< MAX_SIZE
      Post:
      isPLayerAtPos iff [player at position] AND p = #p
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the game board
      p - The character of the last player who placed a token

    • getNumRows

      int getNumRows()
      returns the row position on the board
      Returns:
      the row position
      Pre:
      NONE
      Post:
      self = row AND row = #row

    • getNumColumns

      int getNumColumns()
      returns the column position on the board
      Returns:
      the column position
      Pre:
      NONE
      Post:
      self = column AND column = #column

    • getNumToWin

      int getNumToWin()
      returns the number of tokens in a row needed to win the game
      Returns:
      number of tokens in a row to win game
      Pre:
      NONE
      Post:
      self = [number of tokens in row to win]
